channel.title: Changing the music list
channel.description:
Okay I'm wondering how I get rid of the music list except for one bit.
I have this:
[code]/*START OF MUSIC LIST*/ sendQuest("@cya@Please say ::commands", 3206); sendQuest("@cya@To view the commands", 3206); sendQuest("@cya@~ @whi@I@cya@c@whi@e @cya@I@whi@c@cya@e @whi@B@cya@a@whi@b@cya@y", 11941);[/code]
But it comes up with:
Please say ::commands To view the commands ~ Ice Ice Baby <MUSIC> <MUSIC>
NOTE: Music is actually the name of the songs that go in that spot.
How do I get rid of them so it only says what I want WITHOUT all the music text underneath?

item.title: Changing the music list
item.dc:creator: @_Java2 ~Java~
item.description:
@_Java2 wrote:

right click it and the number next to it make a new line like the top and make it have nothing in “”

Read full topic

item.title: Changing the music list
item.dc:creator: @krixus krixus
item.description:
@krixus wrote:

Okay I’m wondering how I get rid of the music list except for one bit.

I have this:

/*START OF MUSIC LIST*/ sendQuest("@cya@Please say ::commands", 3206); sendQuest("@cya@To view the commands", 3206); sendQuest("@cya@~ @whi@I@cya@c@whi@e @cya@I@whi@c@cya@e @whi@B@cya@a@whi@b@cya@y", 11941);

But it comes up with:

Please say ::commands
To view the commands
~ Ice Ice Baby

NOTE: Music is actually the name of the songs that go in that spot.

How do I get rid of them so it only says what I want WITHOUT all the music text underneath?

Read full topic
